attributes.action: Do Not Use My Tax to pay for the looters Legal Aid
attributes.additional_details:
Cabinet Office is there to provide value for money for the Tax Payer.
I disagree with my tax payers contribution being used to help provide legal aid for the Looters (not rioters).
It does not make sense to punish these criminals with the left hand then provide them with legal assitance with the right hand. How is that going to teach them right from wrong when they clearly do not deserve to use the tax contributed, by those they caused to lose their jobs, businesses and homes.
1) Would prefer my tax contributions to be used to rebuild businesses.
2) Would prefer my tax contributions to be used to provide homes for those who have no where else to go.
3) Would prefer my tax contributions to be used to provide for those who have lost their jobs and their employees are unable to continue paying them.
4) Would prefer my tax contributions to be used to rebuild communities.
